title: The configuration for an MQTT trigger handler
description: Defines the MQTT information sent with trigger notifications.

topic.description: The topic to send when this handler is triggered.

messages.description: A list of MQTT messages to send when the trigger is activated.

topic.description: The topic to send when this handler is triggered.

offDelay.description: Number of seconds of no motion to wait before sending an MQTT state off message. Set to 0 to disable sending off messages. Default is 30 seconds.

payload.description: The payload to send with the MQTT message. Optional. If omitted a payload containing the prediction information and image file path will be sent.

enabled.description: Enables the MQTT handler on this trigger. Default is true.
